name: Clash Of Racers Extreme Racing
description:
Clash of Racer Extreme Racing Drive the fastest cars in Racing Race 2018 ultimate fever racing game which will test your skills and determination to be the best racing cars.

Try your skills in driving simulation game and feel the rush of the fast and hi-speed races. Defeat your challengers on racing in this extreme racing car game with natural racing model.
Clash of Racer Extreme Racing Fast Racing is the fastest and most exciting 3D fast car racing game. Drive, drift and race in city traffic road. Clash of Racer Extreme Racing give you awesome driving gameplay and enjoyment that you can choose your own racing styles. Race your car with high speed through city streets and set new high standards for mobile car racing games. Drift your car on the city tracks while taking the steep and sharp turns. Reality of high speed racing with extreme high quality graphic. Clash of Racer Extreme Racing is the best racing game you have been looking for.
Features:
• real racing experience with arcade features
• Best city Racing Experience
• High quality 3D stunning graphics
• Real racing in illegal races
• Become champion on asphalt racing
• Extremely fast and addictive gameplay
• The most realistic 3D car driving simulation

Clash Of racers extreme racing game is awesome racing game with 3d racing environment.
